captions.text: -Hey, everyone.

I'm Mindy from Cute
Girls Hairstyles.

And today we're going to film
another Hunger Games inspired
hairdo.

And this one we're calling
double French fold-in.

So this one comes from when
Katniss is in District 12,

and she is waiting
to hear who gets
drawn for the actual games.

And you can see from a lot
of the pictures and the movie

that they wear lots of
french braids and braids
in District 12.

So what we're going
to do is start

by doing a pretty
basic French braid.

And I'm going to leave
a few wispies out,
and of course her bangs.

So I'm just going to
take a chunk of hair,
and start French braiding.

We're going to do just a regular
French braid, or an innie.

And I do you have a step
by step tutorial on this,

if you aren't-- if you don't
have French braid well enough,

that you're following
what I'm doing.

You can go back and watch the
actual, really slow tutorial.

But this is just--
so I'm just kind

of doing a loose
French braid, and I'm

kind of keeping it
closer to her ear

than I am the part, in
the middle of her head.

And I'm not taking like
super small pieces.

I'm just kind of
taking bigger pieces.

I'm just going to braid it all
the way down, till we run out

of hair, and then finish
off the braid, like so.
OK, that Elastic band.
Thank you.
OK.

So-- OK, so now we have our
two French braids going down.

And we're going to
do the fold-in part.

So we're going to take
this piece of hair,

and we're just going to kind
of cross them over each other.

And we're going to take this
end back in, and tuck it in.

And while I'm holdin that,
I'm goihng to bobby pin it.
Just to hold it for a second.

Then we're going
to take this end

and wrap it up over the top,
and also hide the elastic there.

And again, using Bobby pins,
which is kind of secure.

Were just anything that you
need to-- until you like the way
it looks.

Now I'm going to
hide this, again.

Sometimes it's hard to
get these Bobby pins out,

once you've gotten them
in, without pulling
the rest of the hair out.
OK.

So I'm just going
to make sure I hide
that elastic a little better.
Here we go.

And continued pin, until
you just-- have all

the hair tucked away,
the way you want it.

So that makes a nice little,
pretty, sort of a folded in,

kind of bundled of
Braves, not in the back.

And then you can
see from the front.

You can just barely see on
the sides, where the braid is.

And it's kind of a fun version
of just a regular French braid.

This is a little
bit more fancy look.
There you go.
We'll see you guys later.

title: Katniss Reaping Braids | Hunger Games | Cute Girls Hairstyles

comments.text:
Hey, do you know "HAIRator" yet? Just just search Google. There I found a 
nice and painless body hair removal alternative that needs no more shaving 
or even waxing and similar old and painful methods. In fact, this treatment 
has even been highlighted in Time Magazine. It made it easier for Anna to 
get long lasting touchable skin. I hope it will help you as well...
